attributes.action: Ban all guns in the UK, nobody should be able to have a licence to own a gun
attributes.additional_details:
Ban all guns, there shouldn't be any reason to need to own a gun.
5 deaths because someone had access to a gun because they had a gun licence, is not acceptable.
attributes.background: All guns should be banned in the UK for anyone other than armed police/army on duty.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/594811
